content: We have a FHIR server (based on HAPI) with an interceptor that invoked rule-based Security Labeling Service ( SLS)/Privacy Protective Service (PPS) on the outgoing data including the application of high-water mark rule when a bundle is being sent out: http://vha.edmondsci.com:8080/hapi15/baseDstu3

As requested...

The demo presented today Q1 at Joint Security, EHR, FHIR meeting is available online

Presentation - http://va.edmondsci.com:8080/docs/HL7_FHIR_HCS_INTERCEPTOR.pptx

Rule Management GUI - http://va.edmondsci.com:8080/SR490UI-ui-1.0-SNAPSHOT/
-> user: admin
-> pass: innovate
Note: Can only add or delete rule, at minimum CODE(HIV, SCA, ETH, PSY) and ACTION (REDACT) must be populated.

Test Condition Bundle - http://vha.edmondsci.com:8080/hapi15/baseDstu3/Condition
Test Resource HIV - http://vha.edmondsci.com:8080/hapi15/baseDstu3/Condition/VHA-EHTAC-Condition-002

HAPI FHIR Interface - http://vha.edmondsci.com:8080/hapi15
@Ren√© Spronk @James Agnew This is interesting stuff for AID....
